title: Could be better…
text: I’ve had a few issues with instagram. Every-time I try to use the live feature it never works and it is very frustrating since going live can help you connect and grow your account. Second, my comments keep getting removed for advertising my account. Why isn’t that allowed? Am I not allowed to ask someone or tell someone they would like my content? What if my account ends up helping them heal or escape or cope? Some of my followers have reached out to me saying I have helped them. The 3rd issue is I would like you to be able to have a longer bio. Sometimes you need more space to share the purpose of your account. My biggest problem tho is insta live. Please fix it. It is very frustrating. Thanks.

title: App is slowly getting worse
text: I’ve had instagram for years and it used to work amazingly. But for the last several months it’s been getting slower and slower. My feed doesn’t refresh or just doesn’t show up. Videos and shorts will only play for two or three seconds and then restart or just stop playing all together. I’ve tried deleting the app, restarting my phone, and my internet is fine. The app itself is just not working well. Some improvements definitely need to be made as the app is useless if you can’t even see your feed or watch the videos.

title: Biased Inconsistent Censorship & Standards
text: I have over the last 6 months reported hundreds of blatantly fake & porn accounts and IG does nothing, very few are removed. Oct. 7 happens, Gaza attacks and almost immediately my commenting privileges are revoked for 24 hours, then 7days with the explanation Spamming. Numerous innocuous comments are removed, such as a quote from Amnesty International. Yet, I have had numerous comments wishing a graphic death or caliphate on me, however IG does nothing. I am not even an “influencer”, journalist or activist. I see their accounts repeatedly receiving threats of removal. The common theme is Pro-Palestine. That said while passionate about the issue I have never used hate speech, bullied or threatened anyone. I am not sharing fringe material. My conclusion is that IG is deliberately trying to suppress Pro-Palestinian content, which is unethical. I fear this is a slippery slope and on the wrong side of history. And by silencing these voices IG becomes complicit in what looks like a genocide. What’s next? Will IG be interfering in elections? Please remove the fake accounts, the porn and the scams. Yes monitor hate speech, bullying but do not block free speech when it comes to people’s lives.
